text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-5, effective January 2, 2013

20 DCSTAT 696

A RESOLUTION

Proposed Resolution
20-5

To reappoint Ms. Nyasha Smith as the Secretary to the Council of the District of Columbia.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the “Secretary to the Council of the District of Columbia Nyasha
Smith Reappointment Resolution of 2013”.
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia reappoints:
Ms. Nyasha Smith
636 Keefer Place, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20010
(Ward 1)
as Secretary to the Council of the District of Columbia, beginning January 2, 2013.
Sec. 3. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Secretary to the
Council of the
District of Columbia
Nyasha Smith
Reappointment
Resolution of 2013
